CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 22, 1950, pg. 3, reads: "Seeks Relatives - James McClure, 17-year-old youth from Chattanooga, Tenn., arrived in Pittsburgh this week seeking a half brother, Thomas Roberts, who he says lives here and raises chickens.  He has no address for his brother, however.  He says Thomas Roberts' father, Porter Roberts, lives with his brother.  Will anyone knowing the relatives that the youth is seeking call The Courier at MAyflower 1-1401. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: James McClure standing on sidewalk beside Wesley Center AME Zion Church, with 1948 Nash Ambassador car in foreground, Centre Avenue, Hill District
